price: 79. Allah nde akeli тропа bino banyama mpo bomataka likolo na yango, mpe misusu boliaka yango.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمَ لِتَرۡكَبُواْ مِنۡهَا وَمِنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu alladhī jaʿala lakumu al-anʿāma litarkabū min'hā wamin'hā takulūna
